description: Json schema for an Address response class. See curl examples: get_route_directions, get_route_path_points
title: Address

___preferred_geocoding.description: Index of 'geocodings' array that the user has chosen
___preferred_geocoding.title: Preferred Geocoding

___generated_time_window_start.description: Generated Time Window Start in seconds
___generated_time_window_start.title: Generated Time Window Start

___timestamp_last_departed.description: Timestamp when the driver marks the stop as 'Departed'
___timestamp_last_departed.title: Timestamp Last Departed

___timeframe_violation_rate.description: Rate of the timeframe violation. In a response only
___timeframe_violation_rate.title: Timeframe violation rate

___geofence_detected_departed_lat.description: Latitude of a departed detected geofence
___geofence_detected_departed_lat.title: Geofence detected departed lat

___geofence_detected_service_time.description: The service time of a detected geofence
___geofence_detected_service_time.title: Geofence detected service time

___invoice_no.description: The invoice number for the address
___invoice_no.title: Invoice No

___geofence_detected_departed_lng.description: Longitude of a departed detected geofence
___geofence_detected_departed_lng.title: Geofence detected departed lng

___uncongested_time_to_next_destination.description: Supposing that there was no traffic at all, this gives how many seconds it takes to get to the next stop.
___uncongested_time_to_next_destination.title: Uncongested Time To Next Destination

___timeframe_violation_time.description: Moment of the timeframe violation. In a response only
___timeframe_violation_time.title: Timeframe violation time

___custom_fields.description: Any unrecognized fields from the original CSV upload will be found here
___custom_fields.title: Custom Fields

___contact_id.description: Address book contact id (0 means not connected to the address book)
___contact_id.title: Contact ID

___customer_po.description: The customer purchase order for the address
___customer_po.title: Customer PO

___email.description: A valid e-mail address assigned to this stop
___email.title: Email

___drive_time_to_next_destination.description: Time to next destination in seconds.
___drive_time_to_next_destination.title: Drive Time to next Destination

___tracking_number.description: Systemwide unique code, which permits end-users (recipients) to track the status of their order
___tracking_number.title: Tracking Number

___time_window_end.description: Time Window End in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows
___time_window_end.title: Time Window End

___first_name.description: The first name of the receiving address
___first_name.title: First name

___generated_time_window_end.description: Generated Time Window End in seconds
___generated_time_window_end.title: Generated Time Window End

___abnormal_traffic_time_to_next_destina.description: Abnormal traffic time to next destination
___abnormal_traffic_time_to_next_destina.title: Abnormal traffic time to next destination

___traffic_time_to_next_destination.description: Traffic time to a next destination.
___traffic_time_to_next_destination.title: Traffic Time To Next Destination

___geofence_detected_visited_timestamp.description: Timestamp of a geofence detected visited
___geofence_detected_visited_timestamp.title: Geofence detected visited timestamp

___priority.description: 0 is the highest priority; n has higher priority than n + 1
___priority.title: Priority

___geofence_detected_visited_lat.description: Latitude of a visited detected geofence
___geofence_detected_visited_lat.title: Geofence detected visited lat

___geofence_detected_visited_lng.description: Longitude of a visited detected geofence
___geofence_detected_visited_lng.title: Geofence detected visited lng

___cost.description: The cost of the order for the address
___cost.title: Cost

___custom_fields_str_json.description: JSON string representation of the custom fields
___custom_fields_str_json.title: Custom fields JSON string

___cube.description: The cubic volume of the cargo being delivered or picked up at the address
___cube.title: Cube

___timeframe_violation_state.description: State of the timeframe violation. In a response only
___timeframe_violation_state.title: Timeframe violation state

___order_no.description: The order number for the address
___order_no.title: Order NO

___address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (PICKUP, DELIVERY, BREAK, MEETUP)
___address_stop_type.title: Address stop type

___original_route_id.description: The original customer-specific route id assigned at route creation time.
___original_route_id.title: Original Route ID

___reference_no.description: The reference number for the address
___reference_no.title: Reference NO

___destination_note_count.description: How many notes have been added to this destination
___destination_note_count.title: Destination Note Count

___time_window_start.description: Time Window Start in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows
___time_window_start.title: Time Window Start

___custom_fields_config_str_json.description: JSON string representation of the custom fields configuration
___custom_fields_config_str_json.title: Custom fields config JSON string

___account_no.description: The account number for the address
___account_no.title: Account NO

___manifest.description: The manifest contains values derived from other values
___manifest.title: Manifest

___actual_arrival_time_ts.description: Time when the address was marked as visited UTC unixtime. This is actually equal to timestamp_last_visited most of the time.
___actual_arrival_time_ts.title: Actual Arrival Time ts

___estimated_arrival_time_ts.description: Estimated arrival time based on the current route progress, i.e. based on the last known actual_arrival_time
___estimated_arrival_time_ts.title: Estimated Arrival Time ts

___running_service_time.description: How much time is to be spent on service from the start in seconds
___running_service_time.title: Running Service Time

___running_travel_time.description: How much time is spent driving from the start in seconds
___running_travel_time.title: Running Travel Time

___running_distance.description: Distance traversed before reaching this address
___running_distance.title: Running Distance

___estimated_departure_time_ts.description: Estimated departure time based on the current route progress
___estimated_departure_time_ts.title: Estimated Departure Time ts

___actual_departure_time_ts.description: Time when the address was mared as departed UTC. This is actually equal to timestamp_last_departed most of the time.
___actual_departure_time_ts.title: Actual Departure Time ts

___time_impact.description: This is the difference between the originally projected arrival time and Actual Arrival Time
___time_impact.title: Time Impact

___geocoded.description: True means the 'address' field was successfully geocoded
___geocoded.title: Geocoded

___geofence_detected_departed_timestamp.description: Timestamp of a geofence detected departed
___geofence_detected_departed_timestamp.title: Geofence detected departed timestamp

___distance_to_next_destination.description: Distance to next destination in route unit (the default unit is in miles)
___distance_to_next_destination.title: Distance to next destination

___failed_geocoding.description: True means there was a geocoding attempt which failed. False means success or no geocoding
___failed_geocoding.title: Failed Geocoding

___revenue.description: The total revenue for the address
___revenue.title: Revenue

___sequence_no.description: The sequence number for the address
___sequence_no.title: Sequence No

___last_name.description: The last name of the receiving address
___last_name.title: Last name
